memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned char *output, const unsigned char *x32, const unsigned char *ell_a64, const unsigned char *ell_b64, void *data)
memberdef.name: ellswift_xdh_hash_x32

detaileddescription.para: This is a hasher for ellswift_xdh which just returns the shared X coordinate.

This is generally a bad idea as it means changes to the encoding of the exchanged public keys do not affect the shared secret. However, it's used here in tests to be able to verify the X coordinate through other means.
